2 – AGE REQUIREMENTS

NIDO (Kinder Garden)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.25.1″ text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”|||50px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507″ text_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”|800|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#b9171a” header_3_font_size=”37px” header_3_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”||35px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”24px” text_font_size_phone=”18px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_3_font_size_tablet=”” header_3_font_size_phone=”16px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

4 – Interview with the school psychologist

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”0px|20px||20px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”|||50px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

When the school receives the required documentation, a date will be scheduled to conduct the interview with the parents and their child(a). Both parents and their child(a)  must attend this interview.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Recurso-5.jpg” title_text=”Rediseño pagina web ADMISIONES NIDO” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”0px|20px|0px|20px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#2F3477″ divider_position=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”|20px||20px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”|800||on|||||” text_text_color=”#B71115″ text_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”|800|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#b9171a” header_3_font_size=”37px” header_3_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”24px” text_font_size_phone=”18px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_3_font_size_tablet=”” header_3_font_size_phone=”16px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

5 – RESULTS FROM THE ADMISSION PROCESS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”0px|20px||20px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”|||50px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

NIDO reserves the right of admission. The response to the admission process will be sent via email and is based on the availability of places.
